human-pose.title: Human Pose Estimation
human-pose.content: This is a demo to estimate human's pose by AI. Try it with uploading your picture.

handwritten-ocr.title: Japanese Handwritten OCR
handwritten-ocr.content: AI will recognize what is written in Japanese. Try it with writing some character in Japanese.

draw-colors.title: Colorization
draw-colors.content: This is a demo to convert a monochrome image to a colorized image by AI. Try it with uploading your monochrome image.

face-age.title: Face Age
face-age.content: This is a demo to estimate age of a person in a picture by AI. Try it with your picture!

mono-depth.title: Mono Depth
mono-depth.content: AI estimates the relative distances in a picture. The farther objects in a picture are converted to grayscale. Try it with your picture!

object-detection.title: Object Detection
object-detection.content: AI will detect TENJI mark and Toilet mark in a picture. Try it with your picture!

segmentation.title: Segmentation
segmentation.content: AI finds people in a picture. People remain in color, while the others are converted to grayscale. Try it with your picture!

super-resolution.title: Super Resolution
super-resolution.content: AI corrects a fuzzy image to high resolution image. Try it with your image!

object-detection-yolo.title: Object Detection Yolo
object-detection-yolo.content: AI estimates the type of objects in a picture. This AI can estimate 80 kinds of objects. Try it with your picture!

image.title: Upload Image
image.content: Click to select image file or drop image to upload.
image.support: Only support JPG or PNG file.

errors.not-valid-image: Please upload a valid image file.
